Blindfear::

Blindfear was far away when Orion fired, He open a comm link to 
Triggerhappy and Skullgrin while he continue digging a tunnel, he was 
far of Orion and the other maximals. "I have an idea that will be a 
shock to Maximals" said Perceptor "but I need that three maximal 
busies"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Orion:::
> 
> ::He was hit by about half of the the shots. He was about to fire 
back, but 
> saw that Blindfear was tunneling underground::
> Orion: Damn.
> ::He points and fires his blaster at the tunnel, hoping to hit 
Blindfear::
